commit.message:
lex.c (java_init_lex): Define wfl_to_string as gnu.gcj.runtime.StringBuffer unless generating bytecode.

	* lex.c (java_init_lex): Define wfl_to_string as
	gnu.gcj.runtime.StringBuffer unless generating bytecode.

From-SVN: r47882
